channel.title: CVE Feed for sinatrateam -- Sinatra
channel.description: The latest CVEs for sinatrateam -- Sinatra

item.title: CVE-2024-37116|2024-08-02T03:50:54.538Z -- sinatrateam -- sinatra
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in sinatrateam Sinatra allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Sinatra: from n/a through 1.3.
